1.0.0.name: wordpress/extra-widget-properties-set
1.0.0.description:
This plugin set is add extra properties to each widget. This plugin set bundles "Extra Widget Properties / Core".

  1. Widget Slug This plugin add widget slug to each widget. eg. when the widget slug is set with "test", "widget_slug_test" is added to html class name in the widget.
  2. Permission controll by roles This plugin add permission control by roles to each widget.
